summary:
The SCP Foundation is a made-up group from a creative writing website called SCP Wiki. They imagine a secret organization that catches and studies strange and supernatural things, which they call "SCPs." The Foundation keeps these discoveries a secret from everyone.

The website has lots of stories and reports written as if they are real scientific documents. These stories mix horror, science fiction, and fantasy. Many people enjoy these tales for their unique style and high quality. The SCP universe has also inspired books, music, films, and games made by fans.
title: SCP Foundation
